sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHEKARPOOR, a town in the province of Sewistan or Seistan, situated on the west side of the Indus. It is a large town, with seven gates. The Hindu merchants who visit this country leave their wives and relatives here for security. It is governed by a Mahommedan chief, who pays tribute both to the Afghans and Ameers of Sinde. Long. 69. 49. E. Lat. 28. 47. N.
